title: Number of Starwood Hotels and Resorts hotels worldwide 2009 to 2015
summary: In general Number of hotels has rose over the Year.
Number of hotels is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2012.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Number of hotels, about 1077.0 was reported at Year 2012
Minimum Number of hotels about 979.0 was reached at Year 2010
